casebody.data:
LETENDRE
v.
CURRITUCK COUNTY, et al. 352P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 18, 2018 George B. Currin, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Long, Michael, et al. Jonathan E. Hall, Attorney at Law, Michael Joseph Crook, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for LeTendre, Elizabeth E. Donald I. McRee, Jr., Currituck County Attorney, G. Nicholas Herman, Attorney at Law, for Currituck County

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of October 2018 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of October 2018."
